attributes.action: make all information concerning every aspect of our MPs available to view on a web page for each MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MPs are our servants.  If we had a single web page giving all information concerning their attendance, expenses, votes etc... we could make a more informed choice whether to vote for them in the coming election.

rejection.details: Issues relating to MPs'are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
